references.paper_title: Diversity is all you need: Learning skills without a reward function
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concept of skill diversity, which is heavily built upon in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Modular multitask reinforcement learning with policy sketches
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of modularity for multitask reinforcement learning, which is relevant to the hierarchical structure of SkiLD.
This paper introduces the hindsight experience replay technique, which is used to improve the efficiency of skill learning in SkiLD.

references.paper_title: Decision-theoretic planning: Structural assumptions and computational leverage
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical framework for factored Markov decision processes (MDPs), which is the foundation for the factored state space used in SkiLD.

references.paper_title: Latent space policies for hierarchical reinforcement learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of latent space policies, which are used in SkiLD to improve the efficiency of skill learning.
